question: Indian mountaineer Bhawna Dehariya has successfully scaled Mount Kosciuszko. It is the highest mountain peak of which country?
explanation:
Indian mountaineer Bhawna Dehariya has successfully scaled Mount Kosciuszko, the highest mountain peak of Australia.
The mountaineer had scaled Mount Everest and Mount Kilimanjaro last year and has successfully climbed the 2,228-metres Mount Kosciuszko now. Bhawna Dehariya hails from the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.
